scripts.publish-patch: git add .; git commit -m 'Update'; npm version patch; sudo rm -rf dist; sudo build -m; sudo electron-packager . --overwrite --asar --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=./build/icon.ico --prune=true --out=./dist/win --version-string.ProductName='GitApp'; sudo zip -q ./dist/win/GitApp-exe.zip -r ./dist/win; sudo electron-packager .  --overwrite --asar --platform=linux --arch=x64 --icon=./build/icon.png --prune=true --out=./dist/linux; sudo zip -q ./dist/linux/GitApp-linux.zip -r ./dist/linux; git push origin master
scripts.publish-minor: git add .; git commit -m 'Update'; npm version minor; sudo rm -rf dist; sudo build -m; sudo electron-packager . --overwrite --asar --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=./build/icon.ico --prune=true --out=./dist/win --version-string.ProductName='GitApp'; sudo zip -q ./dist/win/GitApp-exe.zip -r ./dist/win; sudo electron-packager .  --overwrite --asar --platform=linux --arch=x64 --icon=./build/icon.png --prune=true --out=./dist/linux; sudo zip -q ./dist/linux/GitApp-linux.zip -r ./dist/linux; git push origin master
scripts.publish-major: git add .; git commit -m 'Update'; npm version major; sudo rm -rf dist; sudo build -m; sudo electron-packager . --overwrite --asar --platform=win32 --arch=ia32 --icon=./build/icon.ico --prune=true --out=./dist/win --version-string.ProductName='GitApp'; sudo zip -q ./dist/win/GitApp-exe.zip -r ./dist/win; sudo electron-packager .  --overwrite --asar --platform=linux --arch=x64 --icon=./build/icon.png --prune=true --out=./dist/linux; sudo zip -q ./dist/linux/GitApp-linux.zip -r ./dist/linux; git push origin master
